## fieldctl snapshot

Export registry snapshot

```
fieldctl snapshot [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --db string       database DSN
      --dest string     destination path or s3://bucket/prefix
  -h, --help            help for snapshot
      --schema string   database schema
```
